---
title: Standard Error of Measurement (SEM)
subtitle: Estimation of the distribution of someone's true score on a measure
---

# Use

- Could be used as an alternative to Minimially Important Difference (MID) @rejasStandardErrorMeasurement2008

# Calculation

The SEM was estimated for each scale by multiplying the baseline standard deviation of the scale by the square root of one minus its reliability coefficient @rejasStandardErrorMeasurement2008
